sailpoint.api
Interface EmailNotifier

public interface EmailNotifier

The interface of an object that can send notifications.

Method Summary
 void sendEmailNotification(SailPointContext context, EmailTemplate template, EmailOptions options)
          Send a notification.

Method Detail

sendEmailNotification

void sendEmailNotification(SailPointContext context,
                           EmailTemplate template,
                           EmailOptions options)
                           throws GeneralException,
                                  EmailException
Send a notification.

A SailPontContext is provided in case the notifier needs to load configuration from the database.

The template has already been "compiled" meaning that variable substitutions or Velocity rendering has been performed. The only thing the notifier has to do is take what is in the template and pass it along. This is a non-persistent template and may be modified by the notifier.

The EmailOptions is passed only to convey the list of attachments. There are other things in EmailOptions used during compilation that are no longer required and should not be modified or used, such as the to address and a collection of rendering variables. Everything except the attachment list has already been factored into the template.

Throws:
GeneralException - If there is a server error.
EmailException - If there is an error sending the email.

sendImmediate

java.lang.Boolean sendImmediate()
Return whether emails should be sent immediately, or queued to be sent in the background. This can return null if not configured.

setSendImmediate

void setSendImmediate(java.lang.Boolean b)
Set whether to send emails immediately or queue them to be sent in the background.
